name: screen shot generator
description: Telegram's best and multi feature screen shot bot!

ENV.description: API_ID(required) - Get your telegram API_ID fromÂ https://my.telegram.org/

TOKEN.description: Your bot token, as a string.get this from @botfather

OWNER_ID.description: An integer of consisting of your owner ID

AUTH_USERS(required).description: Admin(s) of the bot. User's telegram id separated by space. Atleast one id should be specified

HOST(required).description: Public URL of file streaming service (See Setting up Streaming Service)

SESSION_NAME(optional).description: SESSION_NAME(optional) - Name you want to call your bot's session, Eg: bot's username

MAX_PROCESSES_PER_USER(optional).description: Number of parallel processes each user can have, defaults to 2

MAX_TRIM_DURATION(optional).description: Maximum allowed video trim duration in seconds. Defaults to 600s

DONATION_LINK.description: Optional: link where you would like to receive donations.

Track_channel.description: User activity tracking channel's id. Only needed if you want to track and block any user. Disabled by default

Time_out.description: Maximum time alloted to each process in seconds, after which process will be cancelled. Defaults to 1800s(30 mins).

DEBUG.description: Set some value to use DEBUG logging level. INFO by default.

Iam_header.description: Authentication token for streaming service. Defaults to
